alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 10:19AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 1045 AM MST... At 1019 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tonto National Monument, or 8 miles southeast of Roosevelt, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tonto National Monument and Roosevelt Estates. This includes AZ Route 188 between mile markers 225 and 241. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin
